name: Wutch – Earn SOLANA Watching Videos | Get Paid in Crypto
description:
Like YouTube but you earn crypto. Get paid in SOLANA for watching videos, creating, and sharing. Join 1000+ daily earners.

Earn SOLANA by:

• Creating engaging content

• Participating in bounties and campaigns

Whether you're a content creator, streaming enthusiast, or crypto curious, Wutch makes it easy to monetize your time. Start earning free SOLANA today!
